Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <Hermes08> From 5836 transactions you are seeing 42k payments to addresses each transaction contains an amount of those payments if you divide 42k between 5k you get around 8 payments per transaction. You will have to look for the each tx id eo0031638bhgg that looks like this in the explorer to see which payments were made
